meaningMnemonic: A <radical>landslide</radical> came out of your <radical>mouth</radical> and created your <kanji>lips</kanji>. Before the landslide, you just had a wide open mouth hole.
readingMnemonic: Now you can use your new <kanji>lips</kanji> to enjoy a nice, cold <reading>Kuchi beer</reading> (くちびる). The Kuchi people are Afghan Pashtun nomads. They are lesser known for their amazing beer. And you've never been able to get this delicious beer into your mouth, but now that you have lips you can get it all in there.
